testimonials.title: üí¨ My Patients' Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Every smile tells a story. Here are some experiences from those who have trusted me.
testimonials.moreText: Want to read more real reviews?

alejandra.author: Alejandra Cabarique Garcia
alejandra.text: ‚ÄúA professional dedicated to her patients, very responsible and detail-oriented; but also humane and empathetic. It's the first time I‚Äôve found a dentist who doesn‚Äôt make me feel fear during procedures. Highly recommended üòå‚Äù

milena.author: Milena Gracia
milena.text: ‚ÄúI would like to express my total satisfaction with the service provided by Dr. Sorany, who performed a smile design that exceeded all my expectations. From the very beginning, she demonstrated professionalism, guiding me clearly and in detail throughout the process. The result gave me great confidence when smiling. She used high-quality materials and her recommendations were very clear. Totally recommended!‚Äù

carlos.author: Carlos Libardo Lopez Penaloza
carlos.text: ‚ÄúI used to be terrified of dentists‚Ä¶ and with Dr. Sorany I found a caring professional for nervous patients like me. I was so impressed that I recommended her to many friends and even brought my son for treatment. Thank you so much!‚Äù

angelica.author: Ang√©lica Parra
angelica.text: ‚ÄúExcellent work! I came urgently due to a broken filling. I was treated warmly and professionally, not only addressing the urgent problem but also reviewing the overall condition of my teeth. Recommended for her meticulous work: I was very happy with the result.‚Äù

brigitte.author: Brigitte Martinez D.
brigitte.text: ‚ÄúExcellent oral rehabilitator. I had an emergency with my veneers and Dr. Sorany explained and recommended the best option for my dental health. After the procedure, the result was wonderful: she gave me back my smile. Highly recommended!‚Äù

john.author: John Ortiz
john.text: ‚ÄúI recommend Dr. Sorany‚Äôs work. She is very punctual and clear from the beginning without extending or overpricing treatments. She performed 2 crowns and several fillings; I was very satisfied with her work.‚Äù

dayanna.author: Dayanna S√°nchez
dayanna.text: ‚ÄúDr. Sorany has been treating me for over 8 years and she is an excellent professional. Her diagnoses are always accurate and her way of working is impeccable. Highly recommended.‚Äù
